item.title: Drones evolve from killing to rebuilding
item.author: Gabriella Beer,
item.description: It is the 17th March 2011 and there is a distant humming from the sky over the Waziristan mountains, on the border between Pakistan and Afghanistan. Is it a bird? Is it a plane? No, it is an unmanned aerial vehicle (a drone to you and me) that is about to fire three missiles into a community â€¦
